content: in ends dee s knotz 2020 © pro tip be very mindful and precise when weaving in your ends if you choose to weave in the ends closer to the elastic there is potential for the end to pop back out of where you weaved it i like to weave my ends in along the top of the dcs and then down into the bars of the dcs you can use trial and error by stretching the scrunchie to see if you ve hidden your ends well enough if you intend to sell this product i also recommend that you try one out for yourself to see how it works this is how i perfected my scrunchies n o w y o u r e d o n e t a g m e @ d e e s k n o t z o n i n s t a g r a m s o i c a n s e e y o u r c r e a t i o n s c h e c k o u t m y o t h e r f r e e p a t t e r n s o n r a v e l r y dee s knotz 2020©
